DOC.brief_summary: Preliminary study show benefit sodium bicarbonate infusion decrease risk contrast induce nephropathy coronary angiography . The investigator plan randomize 478 patient ( serum creatinine 1.5 mg/dl great ) undergo coronary angiography intravenous isotonic saline intravenous isotonic sodium bicarbonate begin one hour procedure four hour . The primary endpoint development contrast nephropathy within 48-72 hour procedure . Patients ejection fraction < 30 % , overt CHF , hypokalemia alkalemia exclude .
DOC.brief_title: The Use Sodium Bicarbonate Prevention Contrast Induced Nephropathy
